name: Winter Wonderland Terrain
description:
This is a winter wonderland scene which contains 4 different types of terrain: mountains, forrest, desert, and snow. There is snow particles falling throughout the scene You can control the movement of the character by using the arrow keys or by using the wasd keys. To control where the character looks you can use the mouse.

Assets I used:

-Speed Trees

-Snowy Low Poly Trees
